name: MoMO
description:
It is the year 2071 in the Museum of Modern OBJKT (MoMO), the new memetic gallery is exhibited with digital works produced by anonymous users.

XDT-1830 is a curator who is concerned with the objectivity of contemporary digital art.

The visitors to the new museum have become members, being able to vote for the works they like or dislike.

There are different ways to evaluate a piece of art: You can look at the number of votes a piece received, the number of times it was re-uploaded, the number of times it was discussed and reviewed, and the length of the discussion.

If a work gets many comments it is usually considered great.

When a piece of art gets less comments it is bad, but if it gets too many it is considered true genius.

Part of MoMO (Museum Of Modern Objkt) 2021. @boreuno
